select ItemID, Category, title, Content, suggestion, views, UpdateDate, modifyDate, writer from postReview where <if test="option == 'ID'"> writer like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')</if> <if test="option == 'SUBJECT'"> title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')</if> <if test="option == 'CONTENT'"> content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')</if> <if test="option == 'SUBJECT,CONTENT'"> title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')</if> <if test="option == null or option == ''">1=1</if> order by PostID desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
